website_summaries.verdict: This fishing kayak has a sturdy design that makes it the perfect fit for larger users.
pros: A large fishing kayak with plenty of storage space
The comfortable seat allows for long excursions
Excels as a fishing kayak for its reliable tracking, which allows users to focus on their line
cons: A few customers received kayaks with unsanded areas

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for a fishing kayak.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality and thoughtfully designed kayak. Plenty of storage, stable, and comfortable. The rod holders aren’t much good for holding rods you’re actively fishing with (live bait, etc), but they are fine for holding them while you paddle around. The seat is outstanding! It’s basically a lawn chair for your kayak. I’ve gone for all-day trips and it was just as comfortable at the end as the beginning. It’s a bit expensive but I haven’t given it a second thought since it arrived. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Devin M

customer_reviews.title: Tracks well in the water and glides easily allowing for decent speed when paddling
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" and have more than enough legroom on this beast. I'm also 250 pounds and am impressed by the stability of it when getting in and out of it. Tracks well in the water and glides easily allowing for decent speed when paddling. I live on a 33 acre lake in Virginia and haven't given it a shot on rough water or a river ...yet. It weighs close to 90 pounds so, be aware that it could be difficult to get on top of a vehicle for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this yak to get me out of the house and on the water more. It's a great value for what you get. Great quality and well made. I've not been ready to try and stand on it yet, but I'm sure with a bit more time in it, it's doable. It's stable enough for paddling for sure. I'm a bigger guy at about 245 lbs. and it's holding me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome first kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, great kayak. I'm 6' 3" 275 lbs and sit pretty nice on this. Haven't tried standing, someone smaller might have more courage.. Lol Storage is nice. Even a cup holder I quickly sat a beer in =) Got a bunch of Yakattack and Scotty accessories that make this even nicer. Seat is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good kayak! Seat quality needs to be improved. It’s a cheap design
customer_reviews.text: Let me say that I do really like this kayak! It could be so much better. The seat quality sucks! It is comfortable but the straps and buckles are very poor quality and break all of the time. You will get the factory to send you 1 new one. I had a friend of mine install cam buckles on mine to actually hold up long term. I love the lawn chair concept on the kayak but it just needs a better design. The kayak has lots of room and places for storage. I know it’s not a 2k kayak and for the money it is a good deal but I just think they could have done so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this kayak, it has all the features of a high end model. The seat is amazing. Very comfortable for hours of paddling/fishing. The built in accessory tracks are perfect for adding the customized features I want. It is very stable and tracks quite well. Moves along nicely, have plenty of room for my legs and gear and was easy to maneuver. Overall this will be a great kayak to fish from. I highly recommend this kayak!!! I wouldn't hesitate to buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Adair Borges

customer_reviews.title: Best for under $1000. Stable, ready, fun, fast.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. Tracks well. Recommend to combine with Werner Tybee paddle. Rigging it is easy. Extremely stable. Love the adjustable foot rests. Was in between this and the 10 foot, but so glad I decided the 12. Boat wake doesn't affect ride. Chair positioning is easy to adjust. Fitted mine with Garmin striker 4 and xpro rod holders. Definitely glad I chose this instead of the Moken or the Light Tackle. Simple, fun, fast, stable.
customer_reviews.author: bp.review

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Nice kayak. Would be a great kayak if it wasn't for the sanded area that wasn't finished.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Langworthy

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and broken foot peddle.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice looking kayak, but badly put together. It’s missing parts and one of the foot peddles won’t stay in place. Nothing we can’t fix, but when you purchase a new kayak you really don’t want to have to put money into stuff that shouldn’t be missing or broke.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Shipping damages
customer_reviews.text: Will update review once I get this thing on the water. Only complaint so far are the gouges and scratches from shipping. For this kind of money it would have been nice to st least only have scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Fisch

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Boat was new and as advertised. Shipped super fast arrived a week early. Did have several scratches and scrapes upon arrival. Shipping plastic was all ripped apart. Apparently these yaks come already broke in lol Also I went through upon arrival and setup and got a half turn on all the screws. FYI I would recommend doing this before first launch. Several times out already and no water in the hull to date also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This kayak is extremely comfortable and excellent for fishing and camping trips
customer_reviews.text: I really like the kayak for a 12 foot fishing kayak it’s really light and tracks very well. I don’t like the rear hatch storage it’s extremely difficult to get things in and out of it. I also think the tackle box storage below the seat makes water fill up too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Presley

customer_reviews.title: Still a great Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Update to my earlier review. Amazon granted a discount on the purchase price. I was able to locate another seller with a replacement chair for the amount of the discount. No return necessary. I'm a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kayak.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kayak..the stability is great. The material seems very good quality. It's my first fishing kayak and im very happy with it. I.ll buy it againg.
customer_reviews.author: gustavo trejo

customer_reviews.title: Quality control wasn't great
customer_reviews.text: The kayak is everything as advertised as far as performance. I received it with a gouge on the hull, a broken sacrificial piece at the bottom/stern area and the the carrying strap on the bow end lost a screw the first time I took it out. All are minor items but taken together should make a new buyer mindful to check the kayak thoroughly when it is received.
customer_reviews.author: Lonngren

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this kayak
customer_reviews.text: If I could only buy one kayak in my lifetime, this would be it. The seat is comfy, the unit is stable, and you can do so much with this kayak, plus it’s a very good value at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and hips, this kayak is extremely comfortable. Able to sit for several hours with no issues. Lots of storage space and plenty of room for my dog. Love it! Delivery service was on time and very courteous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Kayak, Flawless Shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had my kayak on the water yet, but what I can tell you, my Prescador Pr, by Vibe Kayaks is beautiful, the shipping was excellent, the Kayak arrived fully intact, without a scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing kayak
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kayak for the money. The transducer recess on the bottom is great. Good seat and roomy. .
customer_reviews.author: Trdalton269

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. This is the second Pro I owned. The extra two feet made a world of difference on the stability.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kayak. Handles well. Comes with lots of customization. Would definitely buy again, but this one will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Webber

customer_reviews.title: Best Kayak upgrade ever!
customer_reviews.text: I got this kayak upgrading from the Pescador 12. The mesh seat makes an immense difference! This kayak is maneuverable, relatively light and very cool looking. Tons of customization options. Overall a great fishing kayak!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Vieira

customer_reviews.title: I've been out in this a few times now. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been out in this a few times now. Let me start by saying that this is the first kayak I have owned. It seems to track well and is very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Johanneman

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kayak
customer_reviews.text: I have the 10 footer and wanted more space to do more overnight riverside primitive camps. This boat is definitely better than the 10', just a lot easier to paddle for long distances.
customer_reviews.author: dashreeve

customer_reviews.title: Nothing that would allow water to enter but it looks terrible; otherwise it was perfect and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it a 4 because it had a giant gash in the body of the kayak when we received it. Nothing that would allow water to enter but it looks terrible; otherwise it was perfect and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon shipping TERRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kayak great, but shippping was terrible. 1st one arrived damaged. Second one damaged too and drain plug missing. Didn't get it out to remove accessories to notice damage and ride until weather turned nice. Giant 4" gouge in the bow. Now don't know if Amazon will take back after 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Better choices out there
customer_reviews.text: If your considering this kayak for fishing or recreational use this kayak is an ok option. The seat is comfortable for a bit but lack of lumbar support will get uncomfortable after a short while. The molded in rod holders are horrible. You can get flush mounted rod holders installed or put them on a milk crate would be better. The kayak is stable while sitting especially with the seat in low position. Not a meant to be stranded on kayak. You can stand if you have good balance and learn where to stand. Get some practice golf balls for the scupper holes for at least the ones under the seat
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Watts

customer_reviews.title: Cheap components not acceptable for a kayak of this purported quality
customer_reviews.text: This has been a frustrating kayak for me. First, and most importantly, the plastic latches broke almost immediately on the front hatch (see orange latches in picture) for no apparent reason. I now have little way to keep the latch closed while transporting or using. Any engineer should have realized that these cheap plastic latches wouldn't hold up. As others have commented on, the boat is extremely heavy for one person to handle. I'm fairly strong at 200 pounds and need help getting it on the roof rack. When in the water on the ocean, it is very stable. It is not nimble for turning but adequate. Overall, not the quality I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES K BELKNAP

customer_reviews.title: Best kayak on the market for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best kayak on the market for the money. Ive been useing mine for a few months now. Couldn't be happier with this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak . Just wish it had the same Hall design as the sit-in model.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kump

customer_reviews.title: ... fresh and saltwater to fish and it has been great. Very fast and maneuverable with a comfortable seat
customer_reviews.text: I've used this kayak a lot in fresh and saltwater to fish and it has been great. Very fast and maneuverable with a comfortable seat. My only complaint would be its stability, but with a little bit of practice and courage you can stand up in it fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Adolf Guerra

product_meta.title: Perception Pescador Pro 12 | Sit on Top Fishing Kayak with Adjustable Lawn Chair Seat | Large Front and Rear Storage | 12'
product_meta.description: The Perception Pescador Pro series of sit-on-top fishing kayaks are outfitted with the features and performance serious anglers demand Fast stable and designed to track straight in variable conditions—it’s the total package For effortlessly covering water on your favorite lake pond or flat-water River to find the fish All in a boat that's lightweight for easy transport and storage The sit-on-top design offers generous storage and accessory mount options that make it easy to outfit the boat for all-day excursions The removable and adjustable camp chair is the most comfortable seat found on any fishing kayak One online reviewer even stated “the seat alone is worth buying this kayak ” the longer length of the 12 0 model remains maneuverable while adding speed cargo space and stability—perfect for accessing quiet WATERS beyond the reach of other boaters Proudly designed molded and hand assembled in the USA The Pescador Pro kayak is backed by a 5-year
feature_bullets: Your perfect first fishing kayak - Made in USA
Lawn chair style mesh seat with 2-level seat adjustment and breathable mesh for ultimate all-day comfort and no pain
Seat can be lowered for relaxed paddling or raised for optimum casting
Leak-proof one-piece construction with built-in buoyancy for added safety
Large front and rear open storage for cooler tackle and other gear
Proudly designed molded and hand assembled in the USA
Integrated accessory rails on each gunwale for fish finders Rod holders and other accessories
Perfect for lakes and ponds slow moving rivers and streams and calm coastal waters
Boat weight 64 lbs – Max capacity 375 lbs
